x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/evidencevariable-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/EvidenceVariable \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"EvidenceVariable","id":"31e98060-96fc-45b8-b0bd-a5ec79f6dfa2","status":"draft","characteristic":[{"definitionCodeableConcept":{"text":"Diabetic patients over 65"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:16.078+08:00"}}'

parameters.name: composed-of
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the evidence variable

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the evidence variable

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the evidence variable

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The evidence variable publication date

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the evidence variable

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the evidence variable is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the evidence variable

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the evidence variable

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the evidence variable

parameters.name: predecessor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the evidence variable

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the evidence variable

parameters.name: successor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the evidence variable

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topics associated with the EvidenceVariable

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the evidence variable

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the evidence variable
